    • Method Detail

      • getHead

        public PipeHead getHead()
        Description copied from interface: PipeBasic

        Returns the head of the pipe which automatically collects treasure when it moves and possesses a weapon.

        Specified by:
        getHead in interface PipeBasic
        Returns:
        The head of the pipe.

      • getSegmentStack

        public Stack<PipeSegment> getSegmentStack()
        Description copied from interface: PipeBasic

        Returns a modifiable stack of PipeSegments representing the pipe in the direction from the base of the pipe (stack bottom) to the segment connecting to the pipe head (stack top). This stack is modifiable via Stack.push(Object) and Stack.pop(). and changing the stack this way causes the pipe head to move.

        Specified by:
        getSegmentStack in interface PipeBasic
        Returns:
        The stack of PipeSegments representing the pipe.

      • calculateNextSegment

        public PipeSegment calculateNextSegment(Direction dir)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: PipeBasic

        A method to calculate the segment to push onto the segment stack according to the Direction the player wants to move to.

        This method is made purely for convenience purposes, to unburden the person calling Stack.push(Object) from having to implement calculating the segment manually.

        Specified by:
        calculateNextSegment in interface PipeBasic
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction the player wishes to move the head to
        Returns:
        the pipe segment required to move the pipe head in the specified direction
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if null or an unknown Direction enum value is passed as parameter

      • isWall

        public boolean isWall(Direction dir)
        Description copied from interface: PipeBasic

        Checks if there is a wall in front of the pipe head (it just checks if the adjacent TunnelCell) in the specified Direction from the head is null or not.

        Specified by:
        isWall in interface PipeBasic
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction to check in.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the adjacent cell is null | false otherwise.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(ActorBasic actor)
        Description copied from interface: PipeBasic

        Checks if the given actor intersects with this pipe.

        Specified by:
        intersects in interface PipeBasic
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to check.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the actor intersects | false otherwise.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Description copied from interface: PipeBasic

        Returns a value in the range 0 to 100 representing the percentage to which the pipe is undamaged.

        Specified by:
        getHealth in interface PipeBasic
        Returns:
        the current degree to which the pipe is undamaged as a percentage.
